ai-tha-ap518:1.1_0: “One from the bank of the river,
ai-tha-ap518:2.2_0: At the time I was born:
ai-tha-ap518:2.3_0: took a flower from the flower,
ai-tha-ap518:2.4_0: I stood in a mango grove.
ai-tha-ap518:3.4_0: I went to the realm of the Thirty-Three.
ai-tha-ap518:4.1_0: Thirty-six times I was lord of gods,
ai-tha-ap518:4.2_0: acting as ruler of the gods.
ai-tha-ap518:4.3_0: Ten times I was a wheel-turning monarch
ai-tha-ap518:4.4_0: acting as ruler of the earth.
ai-tha-ap518:6.1_0: and roaming up to a wholesome things,
ai-tha-ap518:6.4_0: in the dispensation of the Sakyans.
ai-tha-ap518:8.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap518:10.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Ajjuna.
ai-tha-ap518:11.1_0: today, the Elder Nun Bhaddiya, the sixth and the sixth,
